title: The Anarchist - Sony Reader by C. Sean McGee
description:
The Anarchist (...or how everything I own is covered in a fine red dust)

a short story by c.seanmcgee

On the night of 'The March', The Teacher will find himself, in the most profound and liberating test of his ideals. Part philosophical and politcal satire, and part gut wrenching horror, The Anarchist, proving once again that C.SeanMcGee is to be found neither on the left nor the right of traditional and scholared ideology, points an ironic, poignant and articuate finger at idealism and its literal implications.


This is the 10th Strange Literary Fiction release in The Free Art Collection from C.SeanMcGee, the first for 2014.

Truly Independant Art.

Novels in the works:

- Happy People Live Here

- The Time Traveler's Wife

- Through the multiverse, Round the Galaxy and Out the Other Side

- Oh CUlto!

- I, Cannibal (City b00k 111)


Take Risk and Take Care,

C.Sean McGee

Support independant art. Like the ebook, buy a paperback.
